jobDescription: Id : 19571  Category : IT/Business Intelligence  Location/City : TX - Dallas  Job Type : Direct Hire  Region : Central  Meridian Technology Group is seeking a BI Analyst.  Apply Now  Meridian Technology Group has a great opportunity for a seasoned Business Intelligence Analyst to join our healthcare client who is home to the world's largest repository of fitness data as it relates to health- and is recognized the world over as an authority in wellness, research and education. This is a full time direct hire opportunity. Client is unable to sponsor a visa, nor able to accept OPT visas.  The Business Intelligence Analyst provides professional support to one or more health/medical research studies or organizational projects, to include data collection, assistance in establishment of data collection instruments and protocol, data manipulation and management, computer systems/applications programming and analysis, and reporting.
